info.title: BnB User API
info.description: API for mobile app user authentication (login / logout)

post.description: Public. Body: email, password. Returns user (id, name, email, phone, role, profile_image, motel_id, motel_name) + token.

get.description: Platform stats: total_motels, total_amenities, total_regions, total_districts, total_countries, featured_amenities (id, name, icon, usage_count), regions (id, name, country, total_districts, total_motels), countries (id, name, total_regions). Requires Bearer token.
All amenities with id, name, icon, description, usage_count. Requires Bearer token.

post.description: Create single booking. Body: customer_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, contact_number, payment_method (mobile_money|bank_transfer|cash|card), payment_reference?, special_requests?. Requires Bearer token.
One booking per selected date. Body: room_id, customer_id, selected_dates (array of Y-m-d), contact_number, payment_method, payment_reference?, special_requests?. Requires Bearer token.

get.description: Paginated. Query: page, limit, filter (upcoming|past|current|active). Response: data (id, customer_id, customer, room_id, booking_reference, status, check_in_date, check_out_date, number_of_nights, price_per_night, total_amount, contact_number, special_requests, created_at, room, motel, transactions). Requires Bearer token.

Paginated. Query: page, limit, status (pending|completed|failed|refunded). Response: data (id, booking_id, transaction_id, amount, payment_method, payment_reference, status, processed_at, created_at, booking with room/motel/customer). Requires Bearer token.

post.description: Body: booking_id, customer_id. Requires Bearer token.
Returns each date in range with status available/booked. Requires Bearer token.

get.description: Single booking with customer, room, motel, transactions. Requires Bearer token.

data.description: id, customer_id, customer, room_id, booking_reference, status, check_in_date, check_out_date, number_of_nights, price_per_night, total_amount, contact_number, special_requests, created_at, room, motel, transactions

post.description: Body: payment_method (mobile_money|bank_transfer|cash|card), payment_reference?. Only pending bookings. Requires Bearer token.

400.description: Only pending bookings can be retried

get.description: Returns all districts, optionally filtered by region_id or search. Requires Bearer token.

post.summary: Login or register with email (e.g. Google)
post.description: Accepts email and optional profile fields. Creates customer if new; returns user + Bearer token.

name.description: Used as username if username not set

get.description: Returns the authenticated customer (id, username, useremail, userimage, phonenumber, created_at, updated_at). Requires Bearer token.

post.description: Revoke the current Sanctum token. Requires Authorization: Bearer {token}.

get.description: Returns active motels with optional filters, sorting, and pagination. Requires Bearer token.
Returns up to 10 featured (active) motels. Optional latitude/longitude for distance-based order. Requires Bearer token.
Returns full motel with motelType, district, owner, details. Requires Bearer token.
Paginated motel images. Requires Bearer token.
Paginated motel images with full_image_url. Requires Bearer token.
Paginated amenities with amenity (id, name, icon) and images. Requires Bearer token.
Paginated images for a motel amenity. Requires Bearer token.
Returns BnB rules for the motel or null if none. Requires Bearer token.
Returns all motel types (accommodation types). Optional search by name. Requires Bearer token.
Motels within radius (km) of user latitude/longitude. Latitude and longitude required. Requires Bearer token.
Motels ordered by search count. Requires Bearer token.
Motels ordered by created_at desc. Requires Bearer token.
Returns all regions, optionally filtered by country_id or search. Requires Bearer token.
Paginated rooms for a motel. Optional filters: status, room_type. Requires Bearer token.
Unique room types used in this motel. Requires Bearer token.
Single room with motel info. Requires Bearer token.
Paginated room images. Requires Bearer token.
Paginated room items (name, description). Requires Bearer token.
Returns id and name of all regions. Requires Bearer token.
Returns id and name of all amenities. Requires Bearer token.
Search/filter motels by search term, regions, amenities; sort_by: all|top_searched|new_listings|highest_rated|most_popular. Requires Bearer token.

parameters.name: regions
parameters.description: Comma-separated or array of region names

parameters.name: amenities
parameters.description: Comma-separated or array of amenity names

get.description: Paginated motel images with full URL. Requires Bearer token.

post.description: Increment search count for given motel IDs. Body: motel_ids (array of integers). Requires Bearer token.

get.description: Returns the currently active terms (id, title, content, updated_at, created_by). Requires Bearer token.
Chats for authenticated customer with motel and last_message (id, message, sender_type, sender_id, sender, created_at). Requires Bearer token.
Paginated or all (query: page, limit, all=true). Response: data (id, chat_id, sender_type, sender_id, message, read_status, created_at, sender, attachments). Requires Bearer token.

post.description: Body: chat_id, message. Requires Bearer token.
Body: motel_id (required), booking_id?, started_by? (customer|bnbuser). Returns existing chat or creates new. Requires Bearer token.

bearerAuth.description: Sanctum token from login response. Use: Bearer {token}
